text:
I wanted to add the functionality to notify reviewers of documents to review and
notify submitters when their documents are rejected and why. Code already exists
to notify submitters when their documents are published. Submission
automatically notifies all reviewers of the submitted document, if the submitter
is unable to review it on their own. Thanks to Andreas for
PolicyUtil.getUsersWithRole(). Reject notification is similar to Publish
notification. However, the reviewer can enter in a message as to the reason why
it was rejected. The templates for the messages are only available in English at
the moment.
